subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] get your news in QS!
msgSnippet: The other respondee wanted no or smaller margins so he wasn t scrolling around lost on his IPhone. He will probably also appreciate two columns. I want no (or
messageBody:
The other respondee wanted no or smaller margins so
he wasn't scrolling around lost on his IPhone. He will
probably also appreciate two columns.

I want no (or small) margins so I can print the
text out two to a page and still distinguish the
letters with these old eyes.
*********************
Cut & paste is now a success! For some reason I
didn't have Thoth loaded, that that was all I needed.
Thank you very much!

--- Paul Tremblay <phthenry@...> wrote:

> Terry Smithwick wrote:
> > I'd like to second the request below. Both PDF
> > readers I use (Adobe and Foxit) can scale and
> print
> > pages on my printer, but neither can remove a
> margin
> > that's already there.
> > And I can't cut & paste the font, it's apparently
> a
> > series of images.
> >
>
> I'm not sure what users want here. Do you want me to
> make the margin
> larger or smaller? Right now, the PDF is in two
> columns. The font is not
> a series of images so far as I know; it is regular
> text encoded in the
> Unicode set of QS. I use the Thoth font with
> XeLaTex, if that helps.
>
> Paul


===========
Never insult anyone by accident.
- Robert A. Heinlein
